{{Quest Description|The note [[Sosi]] gave you marks the potential locations of the monument fragments. Because mere mortals often fail to discern its shape, you might need Sorush's help retrieving the fragments...}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Paimon:''' Guess we've finally finished one of Sosi's requests. But we still haven't found all the, uh... monument fragments. Did Paimon get that right? Anyway, let's report back to Sosi once we've found all those fragments!
